p.span: We would like to take this opportunity to welcome you and your child to Hooks Independent School District for the 2019-2020 school year. We are excited about educating your child! This year will be filled with exciting opportunities for learning. Be prepared for a fun-filled year of learning new concepts and skills.

a.strong: Hooks ISD COVID-19 Instructional & Food Service Plan

span.style: background: white; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: #1f497d;
span.strong: The 8th graders may turn in their course selection sheet for 9th grade at Hooks High School café Mon-Fri 9-11am. Tuesdays 9am-3pm when high school assignments are being collected.
